file.name: get_with_multiple_path_param_2.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Entities
  version: "1.0"
paths:
  /person/asd/{personId}/{personName}:
    get:
      summary: Find person by ID
      description: Returns a single person
      operationId: getPersonByIdAndName
      parameters:
        - name: personId
          in: path
          description: ID of person to return
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: personName
          in: path
          description: Name of person to return
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/person/asd/{personId}/{personName}": at 1:111: get: operation "getPersonByIdAndName": at 1:118: parameters: parse parameter "personName": at 1:325: at 1:410: path parameters must be required
